content: *this sweet cardigan adopts the popular swing style making it super easy to dress your little one lion brand yarn * skill level beginner size 0-6 months 12-18 months 2-3 years 4 years finished chest 19 20 22 25 in 48 5 51 56 63 5 cm finished length 9-1/2 10-1/4 11 12 in 24 26 28 30 5 cm babysoft® article #920 1 1 2 2 balls crochet hook - size g-6 4 mm one button 1 in 25 mm diameter pieces back left front right front sleeves 2 collar construction schematics are provided *ed note pattern can be adapted for boys or girls reverse button placement * available in different colorways 70455ad short and sweet child s cardigan 1 2005 *920-170 babysoft yarn pistachio* 90439ad swing set cardigan 2 2009 *920-156 babysoft yarn pastel green* 1 http //www lionbrand com/patterns/70455ad html 2 https //www lionbrand com/products/crochet-pattern-swing-set-cardigan-1
